review: Lightning fast, easy setup, great buy!

review: not as pleased with this as I had hoped, still does seem powerful enough to run my tv, has glitches when internet is slow

review: Outstanding; I'll never use cable again!
author: Sally L.

review: I bought this for my son and he loves it and uses it with our amazon prime subscription.
author: gramolls69

review: I have a Roku box too. Basically, it's the same thing.....
author: Bobofthemtns

review: This thing is great! It is a bit slower than the actual tv but still works great. You absolutely have to use the mini extension cord though or you'll lose connection to WiFi no matter how good your WiFi is. After you do that though you shouldn't have many problems. Also for the price you can't go wrong. Would, and have recommended this to friends already.
author: Trey

review: Very easy to connect to my TV.  There is so much that it can do that I downloaded the Users Guide: Newbie to Expert in 1 hour.  Right now I'm using mostly the apps, but have caught up on a few TV shows too.rkn
author: Cbev

review: I found that it dose not work like they say. I tried for 2 days to get it to work. Once it was turned one I could not go back to TV unless I first unplugged  it. I had to hire someone to come in and get it to work.
author: Amazon Customer
